name: trumpsflood
text: Thank you gentlemen greatly. The pallet jack did the trick.

resp.text: Happy we could help, thanks for the review!

name: Sunnie Gillespie
text: My backhoe broke down after 4 on a Friday. Called and Bradley Holt was the BEST!!! He got me a rental in less than an hour and had it to me by 5:30!!! Saved the day!!!

resp.text: Hey Sunnie, so great to hear that we were able to help you with a rental on such short notice! We will also pass along your kind words to Bradley! We look forward to doing business with you in the future.

name: Rick Sizemore
text: Bradley Holt is the man to talk to when you are in need of equipment!  It doesn’t matter what you’re looking for, he will find it for you, wherever it may be. Great guy and an excellent representative for CAT!

resp.text: Hey Rick, thanks for the 5 star review! We are so glad to hear that Bradley has been able to help you with all your rental needs and we will pass along your kind words to him.

name: Eric P
text: Great people great equipment. Easy rental process. Easy return.

resp.text: Hey Eric, we are so glad you had a great and easy rental process! Please let us know how we can help you in the future for all your rental needs.

name: Raquel
text: Nice salesperson but didn't call me back I found the same tractor for 3000 cheaper in Georgia.

name: Antonio Dawson
text: I work for Grady's tire and we did a service call on a tractor

resp.text: Hey Antonio, thanks for the 5 star review!

name: Wes Hadaway
text: Bradley Holt has always gone out of the way to meet me on a job to advise me on what I needed to get the job done

resp.text: We are pleased that you have had good experiences with Thompson Cat Rental Store. We will also make sure to pass along your kind comments to Bradley.

name: Ashley Coniglio
text: Everyone was very helpful!

name: Rodrigues Huguley
text: Good

name: george williams
text: Great service

name: Kim Deal
text: Neat, clean, very friendly and helpful.

name: Cornellious Sanford
text: Fast and on time when needed

name: Amanda Pruett
text: Online listed that the tool we needed was available for rent and went in and they didn’t have it. Lady that helped us was rude. Call before you go.

name: Starla Wilson
text: Little pricey but was able to get equipment needed with very little problem

name: Rod Drummond
text: Good value you a lot of tools.

name: David Cagle
text: Had what I needed and charged a little much but at least they took care of my need.

name: Denise Hicks Young
text: Friendly employees.

name: Fishlife Productions Co.
text: Great bunch of folks to deal with. Justin always makes sure we are taken good care of and is a wealth of information when we have questions.

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience. We will pass along the kind words to Justin and we look forward to working with you in the future.

name: RonnieandJanice Gulledge
text: Great people who are knowledgeable about their work and customer service  is better than their competitors

name: Jeff Bridges
text: Change you $20 to park there for an event then tow your car. Wouldn't trust them for any of my business as they will clearly just try to swindle you out of your money!

name: PHF TV
text: Easy in easy out and they unload quick!

name: Blake Barnwell
text: They deliver the best CAT experience in town!

name: Joseph Pantoja
text: Excellent place of business.

name: Abigail Snow
text: Despite the misleading name there were no cats to be rented.

name: Donny Atchley
text: Polite

name: Patrick Wilder
text: Went to rent a stump grinder and without seeing the stump was told it wouldn't work. You be the judge of that...

name: John Haggard
text: Staff was very helpful and friendly.  The process was super easy. I needed a hammer drill for a single hole in my bric, so Home Depot tool rental saved me some money versus buying a drill and masonry bit.

name: Inspiring Others to Change
text: Absolutely rude customer service. Extremely elitist attitude by the customer service representatives, almost as if we are bothering them to rent equipment. I would not recommend going here unless it’s your last resort.

name: Motaz Hanson
text: Why on Earth does that place have a one star?! The friendliest employees in a home Depot ever! Jim at the tool rental was excellent. He was very patient with my questions and got me out quickly. I highly recommend this professional and friendly home Depot.

name: Phillip Arnold
text: Whatever you do dont rent from here they keep sending out broken equipment. Happened to me 2 times so far. But this second time the lady i delt with when i brought it back the next day like i was doing something wrong and was being very confrontational and argumentative. Was planning on exchanging for something else, but after how she acted i wasnt gonna rent anything else. She also didnt want to refund me but she knew i wasn't bavking dowm on the situation.

name: Jonathon hardin
text: I tried to rent a piece of equipment from here and the woman at the tool rental desk was very rude and acted like I was bothering her. I left there and went to sunbelt rentals and rented a larger piece of equipment for nearly the same cost as the very small piece Home Depot had to offer.

name: pako Silva
text: Is ok  but you can find better prices at robin rents !

name: Scott Perry
text: I rented a towable hydraulic auger to dig holes for my pole barn and a pin sheered with 3 hours left on my 24 hour rental. I still had three 18" holes to dig. They told me to bring it in and swap it, and I would get a new 24 hour rental at no extra charge. I am very satisfied with the Tool Rental Center at Home Depot at Lawson's Ridge in Madison. I will use them again and fully recommend their services.

name: Eric Ibarra
text: Convenient place to rent tools!

name: Simeon
text: Had to rent some tools, the staff was very helpful.

name: Renata K. Libhart
text: We've rented several tools here & have never encountered any problems. Will do business with again.

name: Teresa Alexander
text: Worst experience ever!  My husband went in and got an estimate to rent a backhoe but was talked into a dozer.  The quote was for $2400.  So, he sent me the next week to rent it and at that time the price went up to $2800.  So, my husband took off work to use it On A Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday & Monday.  But, they didn’t bring it out until 2:00 pm on Thursday when it was supposed to be there early that morning.  He called and they give him the run around.  So, when he finished with it, he called them to come and get it and left it on 3/4 of a tank of fuel.  So after two weeks they finally came to get it and charged us over $2900.  The guy told my husband that the extra was for fuel when he left it with more fuel than it had to begin with which was a half tank.  The guy that brought it out, dropped it off and handed him a paper to sign.  So apparently that paper said that it had a full tank but my husband didn’t get time to confirm it.  So their response was sir you signed the paper.  All I can say is crooked!  We will not do business with them again.  Also, if we had gotten the backhoe we could have did what we needed to do but was talked out of it.

resp.text: Mrs. Alexander, we were sorry to hear about your recent experience at our rental store location in Huntsville. We informed the rental manager immediately upon learning about your experience and hearing your concerns. Our rental store manager reached out to your husband recently to talk to him and help make things right. We hope that is the first step in many to earning your trust and business back. If we can do anything else please don’t hesitate to reach out.

name: lynn bailey
text: Parts department is awesome.  Employees are very friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Lynn, thanks for the 5 star review and for the shoutout to the employees! We look forward to working with you in the future.

name: Alan Joiner
text: We'll organized, clean friendly place

resp.text: Hey Alan, thanks for the 5 star review! Please let us know how we can serve you in the future.

name: Foodie family of 4
text: I’m going to take a minute to talk up Thompson CAT in Huntsville Alabama. I was coming up I65 and she started shuddering real bad. After a phone call to a couple local dealers I got the “we’re 2 days out” Jazz. Or our “CAT scanner is down” Neely Coble recommended Thompson so I called the service manager Mater. “He said bring it up, we’ll diag it for you, no charge, and you can decide what to do.” Fair enough I thought, they diaged it as a number 6 injector, they didn’t have one and had to run to Decatur to grab it. So I approved the job, they ran and got the injector and within 2 hours from start to finish, Truck was fixed and I picked up my next load and never missed a beat thanks to these guys. Thompson CAT a big 👍 up and thank you from me!

name: Cy
text: Great staff and fast service

resp.text: Hey Chris, we are glad you had a good experience. We also think we have a great staff!

name: jose rosales
text: Great mechanic work besides rental, lot is tight, bobtail only

name: Andrew Washko
text: Good Service, Great Folks...

name: RonnieandJanice Gulledge
text: Great company and great equipment and awesome people

name: David Cooper
text: Awesome choice of CAT products to buy and rent with appropriate account

name: Dennis Liuzzo
text: Great place and good prices

name: Jonathan Patterson
text: Great parts department.

name: Aaron Lussi
text: Hey! I work here!

name: Ray Roland
text: Ok

name: Daddy payne
text: Great service

name: Randy Silk
text: Very friendly staff.

name: Captain_Redpill
text: Really good rental rates and deals.

name: ryan averbeck
text: These guys and company are AWESOME!  They treated me like a friend and family member.  Instead of trying to "upsell" me, they actually made suggestions on how I could get my project done cheaper (which would have meant less money for them)!  Not a nickel and dime outfit that tries to get every dime out of you.  They really are straight shooters and I will NEVER go to another company for any equipment!

resp.text: Thank you sir

name: Joel Hamm
text: Great service and pricing! Had small problem with equipment and they took care of it immediately! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you sir

name: Zac Lott
text: Knowledgeable and courteous staff. Equipment is in proper working condition and you can’t find better pricing for what you get anywhere. I would highly recommend this equipment rental company to anyone needing to rent equipment

resp.text: Thank you man.

name: Michael Dietz
text: Great local hometown rental business

resp.text: Michael , thanks for the great review. We look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Allen Williams
text: Friendly place to rent special equipment. Always has what I need.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Mr Williams. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Allan Hoover
text: Tim Allen and Nathan Allen are always there to help.. If you need almost any kind of small equipment this is the place to visit..

resp.text: Thank you Allan for the great review. We appreciate your business and look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Sarah Akins
text: Great place and great people

resp.text: Thanks Sarah for the great review

name: RONNY PARRISH
text: Great place to rent what ever you need to get the job done

resp.text: Ronnie thank you for the great review. We look forward to helping you in the future.

name: jwbrafford
text: Allen rents is top notch in my book.  They are always willing to help in any way they can.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Mr Brafford. We look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Elizabeth McCoy
text: These folks were great. Really helped with all that we needed.

resp.text: Elizabeth thanks for the great reviews. We look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Jerry Long
text: Greatest place ever

resp.text: Jerry, thank you for the great review. Thanks for the long term friendship we have. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Tammy Clark-Southard
text: Best ppl that I have rent from

resp.text: Tammy thanks for the great review. We look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Chris Belyeu
text: Ive RENTED from these guys several times this year..There customer service is A 1..couldnt ask for better people..

resp.text: Chris we really appreciate your great review. We are looking forward to serving you in the future.

name: Joseph K. Hardin
text: New equipment,smaller equipment for home owners,and contractors. Come by and see Tim and Nathan for your remodeling and new construction projects.

resp.text: Joe thanks for the encouraging response.

name: Darrick Sims
text: Good service

resp.text: Thanks Darrick for the review. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Amy Hitchcock
text: Great service!!!

resp.text: Thanks Amy, we look forward to helping you in the future.

name: RonnieandJanice Gulledge
text: Top notch , a real class act both people and equipment! If you need a piece of equipment for your project no matter how big or small this place is definitely worth  trying.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind review!

name: Robert Cole
text: Staff got me directed to right department since I wasn't sure where to go. Dropped off a cylinder for rebuild and they got right on it. Very courteous and helpful.

resp.text: Thanks for your kind review, we are always here to help if you need anything else!

name: John Heathcoat
text: They charged me 10 grand to fix my Caterpillar engine. Unfortunately, they didn't do the job right and my motor blew up. They put me out of business.  It is terrible how they do people. They won't help me get my truck running. They blocked my phone. Some one please help

name: Gene Shockley
text: Had just what I needed. Staff was helpful and courteous

name: Big Gene McKinney
text: Having to have parts for my excavator.

name: Aaron Bell
text: The place was busy and the workers seemed to know their jobs

name: Elaine Renee Shepherd
text: Never VISIT

name: Timothy Patrick
text: Great staff
